scripts.bnr: npm run prepublish && python setup.py install && python usage.py
scripts.build-dist: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack --config=./webpack.config.dist.js
scripts.check: npm run lint && builder run test-frontend-cov
scripts.install-local: npm run copy-lib && python setup.py install
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build-dist && npm run copy-lib
scripts.publish-all: npm publish && python setup.py sdist upload
scripts.publish-pypi: npm run prepublish && python setup.py sdist upload
scripts.start: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack -w --config=./webpack.config.dev.js
